title: Zonyahs At Game End

embed.description: Watch TheKillerBlu's League of Legends video: Zonyahs At Game End is Broken - Plays.tv

body: Fun Fact. If you zonyahs and the game end when you are zonyah'd you arent invulnible. This did end up leading to my death. So please fix.

replies.body: You cant even die after the game ends, anyway..
I think its because when you zonyaahs it removes the invincibilty so it also removed the end game invincibity
